dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
EMAIL

http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/listCityAttractions.html?cid=4&type=0 (Their second paragraph of Bright Filial Piety Temple copied the first paragraph of our first page above; content of their White Cloud Mountain copied the first paragraph of the second page above..)
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=2A9E88C143A01E35F4B990C28FAFAA24?attraction_id=300 (Content of their second and last paragraphs copied our last two paragraphs.)
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=8F97BB327C620E8C96F9207A9F383976?attraction_id=297 (Content of their first paragraph copied ours.)
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/listCityAttractions.html;jsessionid=5B1C2161C4C248ABF29C100FF56BCBFD?cid=28&type=0 (Their content of Lhasa Sera Monastery copied our first paragraph.)
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/viewDayTrip.html;jsessionid=E0C55BE5FD235CB2767E73C6BC4CD2B8?pid=113 (Their content of Lhasa Sera Monastery copied our first paragraph.)
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=CB02BA7A2C123DABD28926307D0D22B5?attraction_id=84 (Their first paragraph copied our first paragraph.)
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=5462C2A9B50056DEA9DEF5380A134BF2?attraction_id=169 (Content of their first paragraph copied our first paragraph.)
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=19A0A9EA9D4472F91C2A98AFF0880376?attraction_id=171 (Their content of Description copied our entire content.)
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=A6CE8D92126C27F0897DDD1D27B22072?attraction_id=170 (Content of their first paragraph copied ours.)
http://sinohotel.com/travel/listCityAttractions.html;jsessionid=FAE81F597C5A683C4AECE9113EEFCFD6?cid=53&type=0 (Their content of Wuhan Yangtze River Bridge copied ours.)
http://sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=CA29185EDA69F9AF0E87BAB530A856F9?attraction_id=200 (Their first paragraph copied our entire content.)
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=E6F60BBE277FFBF100C10C773654EFE9?attraction_id=168 (Content of their Description copied our entire content.)


**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest email request:

ATTN: Google, Inc.
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA, [private], USA
Fax: [private]

FROM: [private]
warriortours.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private]
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]
E-mail:[private]@gmail.com

SUBJ: Copyright infringement
DATE: September 20, 2007

Dear Google, Inc.

1. I, the webmaster of www.warriortours.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website.

The offender is www.sinohotel.com. They copied 12 pages of contents from our website without our permission. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages and image from your search result.

2. Hereunder is the detailed information on the pages they have copied from our website:

(1)Search Query "view exhibition about guangzhou"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/guangzhou/temple.htm
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/guangzhou/white_cloud.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/listCityAttractions.html?cid=4&type=0 (Their second paragraph of Bright Filial Piety Temple copied the first paragraph of our first page above; content of their White Cloud Mountain copied the first paragraph of the second page above..)

(2)Search Query "Bright Filial Piety Temple sinohotel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/guangzhou/temple.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=2A9E88C143A01E35F4B990C28FAFAA24?attraction_id=300 (Content of their second and last paragraphs copied our last two paragraphs.)

(3)Search Query "White Cloud Mountain sinohotel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/guangzhou/white_cloud.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=8F97BB327C620E8C96F9207A9F383976?attraction_id=297 (Content of their first paragraph copied ours.)

(4) Search Query "The Potala Palace, standing atop a cliff more than 28"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/tibet/lhasa/sera_monastery.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/listCityAttractions.html;jsessionid=5B1C2161C4C248ABF29C100FF56BCBFD?cid=28&type=0 (Their content of Lhasa Sera Monastery copied our first paragraph.)

(5) Search Query "Package: Mysterious Lhasa 4-Day Private Tour"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/tibet/lhasa/sera_monastery.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/viewDayTrip.html;jsessionid=E0C55BE5FD235CB2767E73C6BC4CD2B8?pid=113 (Their content of Lhasa Sera Monastery copied our first paragraph.)

(6) Search Query "Lhasa Sera Monastery"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/tibet/lhasa/sera_monastery.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=CB02BA7A2C123DABD28926307D0D22B5?attraction_id=84 (Their first paragraph copied our first paragraph.)

(7) Search Query "Mochou lake 169"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/nanjing/mochou_lake.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=5462C2A9B50056DEA9DEF5380A134BF2?attraction_id=169 (Content of their first paragraph copied our first paragraph.)

(8) Search Query "Zhonghua Gate sinohotel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/nanjing/zhonghua.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=19A0A9EA9D4472F91C2A98AFF0880376?attraction_id=171 (Their content of Description copied our entire content.)

(9) Search Query "Nanjing Museum 170 sinohotel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/nanjing/museum.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=A6CE8D92126C27F0897DDD1D27B22072?attraction_id=170 (Content of their first paragraph copied ours.)

(10) Search Query "view exhibition about Wuhan sinohotel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/wuhan/yangtze-bridge.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://sinohotel.com/travel/listCityAttractions.html;jsessionid=FAE81F597C5A683C4AECE9113EEFCFD6?cid=53&type=0 (Their content of Wuhan Yangtze River Bridge copied ours.)

(11) Search Query "Wuhan Yangtze River Bridge sinohotel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/wuhan/yangtze-bridge.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=CA29185EDA69F9AF0E87BAB530A856F9?attraction_id=200 (Their first paragraph copied our entire content.)

(12) Search Query "qixia sinohotel"
Our Copyrighted Page:
http://www.warriortours.com/cityguides/nanjing/qixia.htm
Infringing Web Page:
http://www.sinohotel.com/travel/attraction.html;jsessionid=E6F60BBE277FFBF100C10C773654EFE9?attraction_id=168 (Content of their Description copied our entire content.)

3. My contact information:
[private]
[private]@gmail.com
www.warriortours.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
[private],
[private]
Xi'an, Shaanxi, [private], P.R.C.

4. The contact info of the copyright offender www.sinohotel.com is:
Email:[private]
Tel: [private]
Fax: [private]

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you very much!

Yours sincerely,

[private]

Ps.: According to your instruction, all our copyright complaint can be sent to you only via email. Please refer to our faxed document to you on July 6th, 2007.
